goal.en: 1. Learn programming concepts 2. Learn program conditional logic concepts 3. Learn programming loop structures 4. Learn to define program function concepts 5. Cultivate the ability to develop simple programs 6. Cultivate computational thinking skills
goal.ch: 1.學習程式語⾔概念 2.學習程式條件邏輯概念 3.學習程式迴圈重複性結構 4.學習定義程式函式概念 5.培養⾃⾏開發簡易程式的能⼒ 6.培養運算思維能⼒

content.en:
1. Programming concepts: introduction to input and output functions
2. Variable data types: numerical data type (int, float), string data type (String), container data type (List, Dictionary)
3. Programming logic: if, if...else, if...elif...else, nested if
4. Programming logic: for loop, while loop
5. Function concepts and definitions (def)
6. Program project topic: Chess
content.ch:
1.程式語言概念：輸⼊與輸出函式介紹(input/print)
2.變數資料型態：數值型態(數值資料的算數運算式)、字串型態(String)、容器資料型態(List串列、Dictory字典)
3. 程式邏輯：條件判斷邏輯(單向if、雙向if…else、多向if…elif......else、巢狀判斷)
4. 程式邏輯：迴圈重複(for loop、while loop)
5. 函式概念與定義 (def)
6. 程式專題：西洋棋

method.en: Lecture Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: 1. Four exams (paper exam + computer-based exam): 40％ 2. Homework: 30％ (Online Judge Exercises) 3. Learning behavior score (learning performance of the learning system): 20％ 4. Project: 10％
grading.ch: 1. 四次考試(筆試+上機考)：40％ 2. 作業：30％ (Online Judge Exercise) 3. 學習行為分數(學習系統的學習成績)：20％ 4. Project：10％

flex_desc.en: The programming project will be published and shared in the 18th week
flex_desc.ch: 第18周進行專題成果發表

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper)

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗
口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面)
作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗

en: Type:Undergraduate Program only.Faculty:College of Liberal Arts、College of Management、College of Hakka Studies only.Department:Non-Department of Information Management、Non-Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering only.
ch: 學制:限學士班。學院:限文學院、管理學院、客家學院。系所:限非資訊管理學系、非資訊工程學系。
